Class BlobDataHandler

java.lang.Object
  net.allwebdesign.common.lib.db.DataHandler
      net.allwebdesign.common.lib.db.BlobDataHandler
Deprecated. 

public class BlobDataHandler
extends DataHandler

A Data handler for blobs usually images. This is the blob implementation of the Data Handler

Author:
George Moraitakis
